id: Lifestyle Design Dashboard Notion Template [Summer Edition]
name: Lifestyle Design Dashboard Notion Template [Summer Edition]
description: Note: This product is an iteration of the original LDD (see here). The content is similar, but with a more cool girl summer aesthetic vibe — enjoy! The Lifestyle Design Dashboard (LDD) // SUMMER EDITION is your aesthetic and strategic hub for designing the life of your dreams. It’s all about tactical execution, self-discovery and becoming your own muse. While it’s not meant to replace your personal planner or daily calendar, this dashboard serves as your ultimate Master Plan x Lifestyle Blueprin
features: A device (computer, phone, or tablet).; A free Notion account.; This is a digital product; refunds are not available as access is instant upon purchase.; Templates are for personal use only—please no reproducing or reselling.
